messages.2: What are you up to friend?
messages.3: Hey friend, do you want to play Fortnite?
messages.6: I hope you believe in yourself as much as I believe in you!

1.1: Why does a chicken coop have two doors?
1.2: If it had four it would be a chicken sedan!

4.1: How do you find Will Smith in the snow?

5.1: How does the Moon cut it's hair?

6.1: What is Matthew McConaughey's favorite bread?
6.2: All Rye, All Rye, All Rye!

7.1: Which laundry detergent does the little mermaid use?

8.1: Why do bee's have sticky hair?
8.2: Because they use a honey comb!

9.1: Why don't they play poker in the jungle?

10.1: Why was the baby strawberry upset?
10.2: Because it's parents were in a jam!

12.1: What does a baby computer call it's father?

13.1: Why do you never see hippopotamuses hiding in trees?
13.2: Because they are REALLY good at it!
